Mzizi School App Da Nang International Fireworks Festival 2018Update: Dec 08, 2016 (TITC) - Da Nang International Fireworks Festival 2017 (DIFF 2017) with the theme from 29 April to 24 June 2017 with the aim to Da Nang becoming a unique cultural festival tourism space. TryTry
Settle the balance above using PAYBILL + ACCOUNT shown to continue using this portal. MPESA Name: ULTRATUDE TECH LTD. NOTE: This is NOT school fee balance. DO NOT use this paybill to pay for school fees.
Settings MziziApp helps you get access to your child\’s academic performance, fee transactions, important school events, and contact information of the school. This app is only available to parents whose school is registered with the Mzizi School Management System. This app provides academic information and many more features. Keep up to date with all the latest information and happenings from your school. Interactive features include: - Ability to view all results - Ability to view all fee transactions - Ability to view class attendance - Ability to view direct messages from the school - Ability to view upcoming events - Ability to view school contact information and payment instructions New Features: -Parent Chat - parent to school chat service -NEW UI Design - Dashboard, Quick preview containing a summary of the current information. -Change password capability -Assignment, Examination, Lesson Exercises, E-Learning Content in pdf, Video and audio formats. -Video Gallery - entertainment and educational. -Assignments, Examinations, Lesson Exercises, E-learning content in formats of Video, audio, and Text. These can be downloaded from the app, and when done, uploaded for submission.
